result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher L. Groat was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Violate/Harassment Restraining Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 813.125(7).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

civilJdgmts.propDescr: This judgment is for fines, court costs and restitution that you were ordered to pay through Dept of Corrections - if not paid during probation - or you get revoked  and have not paid in full - you will be required to pay to the Clerk of Courts any unpaid amount plus interest.

supervisions.notes:
Sentence w/held probation 6 months
   Fine $379.00 plus DNA surcharge of $200.00 for total of $579.00 - No contact with Jody Rindsig - follow terms of restraining order

miscConds.notes: DNA Surcharge $200.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Fine $379.00   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Christopher L. Groat in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds defendant has freely waived his right to an Attorney.   Defendant entered plea of guilty changed plea to no contest.  Court finds defendant guilty.

COURT:  Sentence w/held probation 6 months
   Fine $379.00 plus DNA surcharge of $200.00 for total of $579.00 - No contact with Jody Rindsig - follow terms of restraining order
No Contact with Jody A Rindsig

Defendant Christopher L. Groat in court.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint, wishes to contact counsel.   DEF temporarily waives right to attorney.  Court enters NG Plea.  SIBS $500  No Contact Jody A. Rindsig  Scheduling conference scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 10:00 am.
